Segment.name: BCO
Segment.comment: To indicate the beginning of the Procurement Notices Transaction Set and transmit identifying numbers and dates

Field.name: TransactionSetPurposeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying purpose of transaction set

Field.name: RequestForQuoteReferenceNumber
Field.comment: Number assigned by the purchaser to identify his request for quote

Field.name: Date1
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification1
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: ContractStatusCode
Field.comment: Code designating the current status of the contract

Field.name: Date2
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: Date3
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: AcknowledgmentType
Field.comment: Code specifying the type of acknowledgment

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification2
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: TransactionTypeCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the type of transaction

SyntaxNote.name: P0910
SyntaxNote.comment: If either BCO09 or BCO10 is present, then the other is required.
